message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $1200000. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the product's value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is a fair compromise, taking into account the value you'll derive from the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $950000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is a fair price, taking into account the value you'll derive from the product and the effort I've put into it.
